comment: I love Prof. Knoop. I had her for 3320 and 3330. She gives exemplars of all assignments and allows you to make corrections until you get a grade you're happy with! She truly cares about her students and is very knowledgeable. She is lenient on due dates. I highly recommend taking her!

This is a tough professor but she does make it clear on day 1. The class was hard. You had to watch multiple videos every week and write about them. The signature assignment is difficult but she does give good feedback. I personally would never take her again because she is a "my way or the highway" but she is understanding in certain circumstances

Professor Knoop is an amazing teacher who truly cares about her students. She's passionate, knowledgeable & supportive. The workload is a bit heavy (KSU requirement) but she's flexible, helps you manage the workload & gives thorough feedback. Her instructions are clear, she is quick to reply to any emails & the class is well organized.

I've had her for 3320 and 3330, and her passion for literacy is contagious. I love how she addresses literacy & social issues and advocates for students. She goes over each assignment in detail & even has videos. She wants to equip us to be the best literacy teachers, and it's evident through her teaching! I've learned more than in any other class.

Professor knoop was a nice person, but i did not care for her class/her as a teacher. the workload is insane, and her feedback is sometimes discouraging. every single week there is prework which consists of watching several very long videos, podcasts, or articles and writing about every single one. feels like busy work & did not benefit me at all.

She is a tough grader, but she gives you really good feedback and lets you redo assignments without taking off points. She really wants you to succeed and will answer any questions you have. She is very friendly, and I would highly recommend taking her! Her midterm and final were open note.

This professor was one of my favorites all semester. She was caring, gave GREAT feedback, and gave opportunity to resubmit assignments for a better grade. The class was a little challenging and there were a lot of assignments to juggle with field placements, but she did everything in her power to make it better for the students.

Professor Knoop is so sweet and caring. The amount of work in this course is absolutely ridiculous and is not clear on what to do. Professor Knoop tried her best to support the class and answer any clarifying questions. Despite it being a hard course, she was super helpful!
This professor was kind at times. She was a tough grader and her directions on assignments were very unclear. She will let you redo assignments but she gives discouraging feedback.

While Knoop is very nice (sorta) her grading is AWFUL! she did not explain expectations well and i had to re do everything i was SOOO discouraged by her grading. She have us homework weekly that was 3-4 videos that were all 30min to an hour long. i hated this class so much, dont take lol
